title: December 2019 Double Feature
itunes:title: December 2019 Double Feature
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
"You've Heard This Before" written by _theglobetrotter_ and "Don't Go to the Movie Set in Latonia" written by drunktilTuesday and narrated by Danielle Hewitt ***

Support Lake Clarity: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/honestfriend/lake-clarity-season-three?ref=discovery&term=lake%20clarity

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube:

https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Produced by Steve Blizin

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
